TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HttpSessionStateContainer extends System.Object implements class System.Web.SessionState.IHttpSessionState

summary.span: 包含目前要求的工作階段狀態值，以及工作階段層級設定。

span.span: Contains session-state values as well as session-level settings for the current request.

remarks.format: ## Remarks ASP.NET 提供工作階段狀態管理，可讓您儲存多個要求相關聯的唯一的瀏覽器工作階段的資訊。ASP.NET provides session-state management to enable you to store information associated with a unique browser session across multiple requests. 您可以儲存參考的索引鍵的名稱或數值索引值的集合。You can store a collection of values referenced by a key name or by numerical index. 存取工作階段值和功能是可透過類別，這是可透過存取屬性的目前或屬性。Access to session values and functionality is available using the class, which is accessible through the property of the current or the property of the . 類別存取工作階段狀態值以及工作階段層級設定所參考的工作階段狀態容器，這是實作介面已填入工作階段狀態資料並加入至的目前要求的工作階段狀態模組。The class accesses session-state values and session-level settings by referencing a session-state container, which is an implementation of the interface that has been populated with session-state data and added to the of the current request by the session-state module for the . 類別會呼叫類別，用來管理工作階段設定和在記憶體中的值。The class calls the class, which manages session settings and values in memory. 類別是 ASP.NET 實作介面。The class is the ASP.NET implementation of the interface. 類別並不適合從應用程式程式碼呼叫。The class is not intended to be called from application code. 如果您更換使用自訂的工作階段狀態模組，您可以使用類別，或提供您自己實作介面。If you replace the with a custom session-state module, you can use the class, or supply your own implementation of the interface. ## Examples 如需自訂的工作階段狀態模組使用的範例類別做為目前要求的工作階段狀態容器，請參閱類別概觀。For an example of a custom session-state module that uses the class as the session-state container for the current request, see the class overview.

related.span: ASP.NET 工作階段狀態概觀

span.span: ASP.NET Session State Overview

remarks.format: ## Examples 下列程式碼範例所示填入新自訂工作階段狀態模組的事件處理常式物件與新的或現有的工作階段資訊，並將它加入至目前要求使用方法。The following code example shows the event handler for a custom session-state module that populates a new object with new or existing session information and adds it to the of the current request using the method. 自訂的工作階段狀態模組的完整程式碼範例，請參閱類別概觀。For a full code example of a custom session-state module, see the class overview. summary.span: 將目前的工作階段標記為已放棄。

span.span: Marks the current session as abandoned.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法標記屬性設為`true`。The method of the marks the property as `true`. 自訂工作階段的模組就可以查詢屬性，並移除工作階段資訊，若屬性是`true`。A custom session module can then query the property and remove the session information if the property is `true`.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int CodePage { int get(); void set(int value); };
member this.CodePage : int with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定目前工作階段的字集識別項。

span.span: Gets or sets the character-set identifier for the current session.

value.span: 目前工作階段的字元集識別項。

span.span: The character-set identifier for the current session.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 字元集 （字碼頁） 用來解譯多位元組字元資料，判斷字元值，並排序次序。A character set (code page) is used to interpret multibyte character data, determining character value, and therefore sort order. 字碼頁設定僅適用於多位元組字元資料，而無法 Unicode 字元資料。Code-page settings apply only to multibyte character data, not to Unicode character data. 這屬性會提供與舊版 ASP 只有相容性。This property is provided for compatibility with earlier versions of ASP only. 如果您不需要維護回溯相容性的 ASP 網頁，使用屬性改為。If you do not need to maintain backward compatibility with ASP pages, use the property instead.

ASP.NET 不會在工作階段狀態儲存的地區設定識別碼。ASP.NET does not store the locale identifier in session state. 屬性存取取得或設定識別項的屬性。The property accesses the property to get and set the identifier.

span.span: An attempt was made to set the value to an integer value greater than the maximum allowed when is set to or .
The maximum allowed is 525,600 (one year).
